title: Nitheshnirmal Sadhasivam
text:
I am a optical and radar remote sensing enthusiast. My main research interest focuses on using geodetic remote sensing for studying groundwater dynamics in the aquifers. The long term goal of mine is to be in the forefront of Hydrogeodesy research.

University of Twente | Enschede, The Netherlands MSc in Geo-information Science and Earth Observation (Specialisation: Natural Hazards and Disaster Risk Reduction) | Aug 2020 - Aug 2022
Bharathidasan University | India MSc BSc in Geography | July 2014 - April 2019



University of Twente | Education and Research Officer | Nov 2022 - Dec 2022
